# Description

Please include a summary of the change - PRs should typically be restricted to add new icons. This can be done by updating `StoreApps.txt` to import new icons for Store apps, or directly adding icon images.

## Type of change

- [ ] New Store icon by updating `StoreApps.txt`
- [ ] Adding new icon images
- [ ] Other (add details below)

# Change details

Please add details of changes to the `StoreApps.txt` file or icon images included in the pull request.

# Checklist:

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] My change to `StoreApps.txt` includes the Store application name only and has been tested
- [ ] Icons added in this PR are in PNG format with a transparent background
- [ ] Icons added in this PR are at least 256x256 pixels
- [ ] Icons added in this PR are official vendor icons (no 3rd party icons)
